words.definition: An arrangement for what you intend to do.

example.en: We have a plan to go hiking this weekend.
example.ar: لدينا خطة للذهاب في نزهة نهاية هذا الأسبوع.

words.definition: The period from Friday evening to Sunday night.
words.arabic_definition: الفترة من مساء الجمعة حتى مساء الأحد.

words.definition: A request to come to a social event.

example.en: I received an invitation to a party.

words.definition: A story shown on a screen; a film.

example.en: We are going to watch a movie.

words.definition: A place where you can buy and eat a meal.
words.arabic_definition: مكان يمكنك فيه شراء وتناول الطعام.

example.en: They reserved a table at the restaurant.

words.definition: To leave home to go to a social event.
words.arabic_definition: يغادر المنزل للذهاب إلى حدث اجتماعي.

example.en: Do you want to go out this evening?

words.definition: To take part in an activity with others.

example.en: Can I join you for lunch?
example.ar: هل يمكنني الانضمام إليك لتناول الغداء؟

words.definition: An outdoor meal where people sit on the ground.
words.arabic_definition: وجبة في الهواء الطلق حيث يجلس الناس على الأرض.

example.en: We planned a picnic in the park.

words.definition: To go from one place to another, often for enjoyment.
words.arabic_definition: الانتقال من مكان إلى آخر غالبًا للاستمتاع.

example.en: They want to travel to the mountains.

words.definition: To rest and enjoy free time.

example.en: I just want to relax this weekend.
example.ar: أريد فقط أن أسترخي في عطلة نهاية الأسبوع.
